FuncDef:
The ip large-community-list command sets a BGP Large-Community list and displays the Large-Community list view.
The undo ip large-community-list command deletes a BGP Large-Community list. The ip large-community-list command sets a BGP Large-Community list and displays the Large-Community list view. The undo ip large-community-list command deletes a BGP Large-Community list. By default, no BGP Large-Community list is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a BGP Large-Community list.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

ExtraInfo: The Large-Community attribute is a private attribute of BGP and can be flexibly applied to route-policies. To set a BGP Large-Community list, run the ip large-community-list command. The BGP Large-Community list can be used to assign values to the Large-Community attribute in BGP routes.
